The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said. From a defensive standpoint, you've got to keep him from controlling the game and monopolizing the game. That's what we have to try and do with Aaron Rodgers . He's a great player. He can create, improvise with his feet, go to his second and third choice in the route because he has such a quick release. Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers or Michael Vick nor as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Donald Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Isnilon Hapilon al-Zarqawi, a Jordanian extremist who later led the Iraq branch of the al-Qaida terrorist network.
